/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway, divided by a median, stretches out ahead, disappearing into the distance. On either side of the highway, lush green trees line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the far distance, the majestic mountains rise against the sky, adding a sense of depth and scale to the image. The image is taken from a low angle, making the highway appear longer and more expansive. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the highway. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of a busy city like Beijing.
